p: In a comparative study between N. sativa seeds and a triple therapy using clarithromycin, amoxicillin, and omeprazole, it was reported N. sativa was clinically significant against Helicobacter pylori ( H. pylori). In an experiment of 88 adult patients with positive H. pylori infection, H. pylori eradication was observed respectively 82.6%, 47.6%, 66.7% and 47.8% with triple therapy, 1 gm NS +40 mg omeprazole, 2 gm NS +40 mg omeprazole and 3gm NS +40 mg omeprazole. Eradication rate with 2 gm NS was significant in reference to 1 g and 3gm ( Salem et al., 2010).
